website_summaries.verdict: Boasting a full-sized brushed metal frame complete with charming scroll work, this affordable daybed achieves a winning combination of style and functionality.
pros: The versatile design can be used to add character to a bedroom or as a 2-person sleeping and seating solution for smaller homes
Strong metal frame holds up well to everyday use
Thoughtful craftsmanship with fine details makes it appear more expensive than it is
cons: Assembly is easy enough, but can take a while

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sturdy, squeak free bed
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this bed. Shipping time was excellent with the bed arriving ahead of schedule. The box was heavy and the bed was packaged well. Putting it together was a breeze. The instructions were complete and showed each step accurately. My husband and I had it put together in about an hour. It is very sturdy and doesn't squeak at all. The bed is gorgeous and looks wonderful in my daughters room.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Greer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bed
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. I paired it with a 13'' matteress and it holds my weight (270# as well as my child ~ 50#) with no squeaking or issues. Only issue I had with it was that there were issues with failed paint on flaking welded areas as well as the bolts being silver and the bed being white so they stand out more then I would have prefered.
customer_reviews.author: Kammie Wold

customer_reviews.title: Not pewter, but Full size daybed at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Pewter?! No, it's a flat gray paint. Maybe the bronze is black, which would have been better, but box and item too big to try to do a return. Just assembled yesterday. My husband did the hardest parts, twisting metal pieces into straight alignment, etc. Three of the 20 plastic pieces to hold in the cross bars that support the mattress snapped during assembly, but we left them in. Seems solid, other than that and kid is thrilled. This is one of the few full size daybeds out there, definitely a great price. Plenty of room for under bed storage. Bed is really high up with a thick mattress and foam pad.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't love a full sized day bed
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love a full sized day bed? It's pretty great. This product seems well made, wasn't too hard to put together and is very sturdy. It isn't a daily sleeping space for us but when it has been slept on there's been no complaints. I didn't get a box spring so the sides and back do give some additional support for sitting up with pillows. You can easily make this bed much more sofa like with lots of pillows. Also, its pretty high off the ground which we love as does our pups who love to be with their bones underneath it.
customer_reviews.author: Elle H.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: Bed set looks great but i don’t have the main screws. I contacted the company 2 weeks ago and still have not received the screws. I’m at the point where i want to return the item. That’s how mad i am. On the instruction manual it says not to return bed if items are missing. Must happen a lot.
customer_reviews.author: taylor mcneil

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together, very pretty, good, solid piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint was that the box was heavy and getting it inside my house from the porch was a chore - other than that it was wonderful! Instructions were incredibly clear, took about 2 hours to assemble but I'm not very good at stuff like this. Noticed weight limit is actually 450 and not 400 like the ad states. It's so beautiful and looks much more expensive than it really is. Good quality and well worth the investment for a beautiful piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: southsidevashopper

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bed frame! I had to put this together by myself, so it took a couple of hours. I laid everything out first, and counted pieces. They give you a little kit with extra pieces just in case! Niiiiiiiiiice Nothing was broken, or chipped, or missing. Bed is sturdy, NO squeaking. The bronze paint had a faint odor, but it dissipated after a couple hours. These were some of The best instructions I've seen in a while. I got the feeling that the company was very concerned with customer service and ease of assembling the product. This was a great investment. Thanks DHP!
customer_reviews.author: CoCoPuff

customer_reviews.title: This is great. The box was beat to hell when I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great. The box was beat to hell when I got it. I was worried it would be chipped but it wasn't! It had another layer of thick cardboard on the inside which protected the metal nicely. I wish the bolts and screws were painted the same color. That's the only thing I disliked about this. Everything was easy to assemble, and it is very sturdy. Had it together for a couple weeks now and it is holding up good. No annoying creaking, which I was afraid would happen with a metal frame. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this twin size day bed for just over a year. We bought it for our 7 year old daughter as part of a bedroom redo for her birthday. Putting it together was pretty easy, but it squeaks and wobbles horribly. The screws need to be tightened frequently. If they aren't tightened regularly I'm seriously convinced it would just fall apart. This bed is the biggest piece of junk, and I wish I would have packed it back up and sent it back. Most of the reviews for this bed have to be fake. I would NOT recommend it to anyone. Ever.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey R Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE. Was pretty easy to put together but time consuming. Great for my daughters bed and would definitely fit a trundle underneath. Seems very sturdy so far, have been using it for several months and my kids are all over it and play under it too. Have really firm mattress with it that was too hard on a box spring. Is really comfortable now, so not sure how it would work with a really soft mattress. Will definitely be buying another for my sons room.
customer_reviews.author: amber davis

customer_reviews.title: I was very happy with the daybed at first
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the daybed at first. It fit my needs for my guest room well. Today however I noticed that the scroll work on one end had seperated from the top of the frame. Since it's hardly used I and I've only had it a couple of months I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this day bed my 4 year old daughter's room. It's really cute and girly enough for her. We put it together in about 45 minutes with no problems. It's easier when you have a helping hand. All tools needed are supplied. I didn't give this bed 5 stars because it squeaks a good bit. Great bed!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna K.

customer_reviews.title: The less than 2 year fix
customer_reviews.text: Loved it for the minimal 2 years we had it. We could store so much under the bed and it completed the perfect look for my daughters room! ....2 years and 3 months later it has been slowly falling apart until tonight it finally broke. She can’t even jump on her bed as our ceilings are too low and the bed is too high...so this is truly just normal wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: DJK

customer_reviews.title: Looks good.  Well made.  "Some assembly required".
customer_reviews.text: "Some assembly required". Be prepared to spend a few 10-20 min building. It comes with really good, clear easy to follow instructions. The bed looks great in my daughters room and she loves it. It will be her college apartment bed when she moves out soon. It is also very light and easy to move around if needed. I recommend purchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: JM-The Technology Guy

customer_reviews.title: Broke in half
customer_reviews.text: After 4 months of sleeping on it, the metal bed frame is falling in half. We bought the bed for our 12 year old daughter, and at first loved the bed, its beautiful but Junk. She's only 12 and nowhere close to the weight limit of the bed frame. She was just sleeping on it the other night and the entire frame just cracked and broke in half, metal should not break in half.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Creaky Bed
customer_reviews.text: This is a fairly nice looking bed frame. After about a month it started making a lot of noise. The metal on metal creaking is pretty obnoxious. I wouldn't buy this again. I think if you had it as a guest bed that was used once in a blue moon it wouldn't bother you. Parts of it are rusting for some reason as well. I was able to put this together just by myself, but my hands hurt afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Simple to assemble and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The DHP Victoria Full Size Metal Daybed arrived ahead of schedule, but the box was a disaster. Fortunately nothing was damaged or missing! Assembly was very easy with two people, though one person could certainly manage. The height off the floor is very nice, especially since this is in a kid's room and what kids don't like hiding under the bed? We put a modest memory foam mattress on this frame and the pair work great together. If you're a taller person, the majority of the sides are at or slightly below the top of the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: Like other reviewers said
customer_reviews.text: End guard rail has no threading, so we cannot screw the nail in. Called DHP and reported the defective part. Waiting for a shipment tracking number for replacement part. Like other reviewers said, there is quality control issue with production that all parts should be checked before packing.
customer_reviews.author: T square

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality for the price! Very attractive. My nephew assembled it pretty quickly. All pieces were in carton.
customer_reviews.author: E. M. Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Its beautiful n easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Can't stop myself from writing. Its beautiful n easy to assemble. My children are very happy to have it. Gave 4 stars because the first package came without hardware pack without which one can not assemble the day bed. We had to return it. We live on 2 nd floor and irs too heavy to take upstairs n then to return brought it down again. They sent the replacement. So again we had to take it upstairs. It was annoying but at the end we are happy.
customer_reviews.author: bobby

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I didn't like was that the product was pictured on the side ...
customer_reviews.text: Packaged and shipped securely and quickly. The only thing I didn't like was that the product was pictured on the side of the box. I prefer my neighbors not knowing what is being shipped to my house. Other than that it has withstood my teenage daughter and her large dag very well. The bed is sturdy and well made. The height allows for a trundle bed to be added in the future or for under the bed storage. I would purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Vaudevillevictim

customer_reviews.title: Nice big daybed
customer_reviews.text: We love this daybed. Originally I was looking for a wood one but I'm really glad we chose this instead. It looks nicer than in the picture, it looks elegant and it's very sturdy and since not wood no worries about breaking planks etc. the size is very roomy for one but can sleep 2 so is perfect for grandparent and guest visits. We got a budget memory foam mattress and it's sooo much more comfortable than our old full size sleeper sofa and our 3 yr old twins like to relax & watch their fave show there. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Branch

customer_reviews.title: Great bed
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this bed. It is exactly what I wanted and it was relatively easy to put together. They were some tough parts of it to put together but the instructions were easy to follow. That is very sturdy and I'm just very happy with it. Great product. thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: Diane R. Floyd

customer_reviews.title: I would reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Honestly pretty surprised. I didn't have any specific expectations, I just needed a full size daybed to hold a spare mattress in a spare room. Putting the frame together i thought, wow it seems pretty sturdy, a little noisy, but sturdy. Then you clip on these plastic locking devices that lock the support rails together & it quiets right down. Super stoked on the purchace. Btw, I put together by myself...a bit tricky to do alone at first, but once the base is together it goes pretty quick. Simple instructions.
customer_reviews.author: jaeswi

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price. Some assembly required-took a bit of time because I did it by myself which is always more challenging. It would be pretty easy with someone to help. But, it can be done alone with less difficulty than other things I've put together. Thank goodness all the holes lined up! When does that happen? It is heavy and appears to be sturdy. Fits nicely in the small room I put it in and have space for my sewing machines. Gave 4 starts because the packaging was not good. The surface scratches somewhat easily, so be careful when unpacking and assembling or moving it.
customer_reviews.author: TLD

customer_reviews.title: *Warning*DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I usually don’t leave bad reviews, but who ever packed this box is dumb AF lol. JS. I ordered this for my daughter and when my husband finally tried to put them together, he told me he was missing a piece. Order it you might get lucky, but I’m just letting you know you might not get everything that comes with it. 😡😡😡
customer_reviews.author: Darelle

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: The frame arrived yesterday and it took about an hour and a half for me to put it together by myself. I had to open it in the garage and bring up in sections as the whole thing was too heavy for me to carry. The bronze is definitely more of a dark brown, but it seems sturdy and solid. No scratches, missing pieces or broken parts as other review here stated. If anything changes I'll be sure to post an update
customer_reviews.author: Irene Brackett

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Love the bed for the price I paid install was simple and took me about an hour and 1/2 to install with the help of a 10yr old. All Parts came with the bed nothing missing and none of the polls were bent the packaging was a bit beat up but all my pieces were available to me and the bed is a bit squeaky after a week of laying on it but I still love it no problems here. Also the bed sits high enough to place a trundle underneath I'm 5-9 and my feet just barley touch the floor while sitting on the bed
customer_reviews.author: KeeKee

customer_reviews.title: Not one bad word was uttered
customer_reviews.text: I waited until I had help yesterday to put this together. I have never had manual so completely detailed that every fitted and set in place with very little effort. Not one bad word was uttered! Everything was labeled and there were even a couple extra pieces. If ever have to buy something that has to be put together DHP will be my go to company. I bought the white version. It's very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: sharonruth

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together, sturdy? I don't know.
customer_reviews.text: While I really like the bed, it showed up with cracked and peeling paint, it doesn't seem like it would hold much weight at all. I really don't like that it came with some plastic parts, that seem like they will get broken from use over time. I will update at a later time on how it's holding up but for now it does the job. Not recommend for older children, or ones who don't know not to horse play. 2 stars taken off because of plastic parts and paint chipping areas.
customer_reviews.author: mumof5

customer_reviews.title: This was the easiest thing I have ever put together!
customer_reviews.text: First, this arrived three days early. Each piece was clearly marked and there was even a separate bag labeled "extras" with additional small pieces. The well written directions were easy to follow. Two people were suggested, but I'm a 70 year old woman and did it myself with no problems. It took two Hallmark movies, but that included breaks for phone chats and snacks, so I probably could have done it in about an hour and a half if I'd stuck to it. So far it's sturdy, comfortable and holding up well!
customer_reviews.author: Noreen M

customer_reviews.title: Just feels flimsy
customer_reviews.text: There’s nothing *terrible* about this frame - it just feels very flimsy and unsturdy. Cons: Do you want a daybed that feels unsteady and unsturdy? Every time I put my weight on it (130 pounds), I feel like it could cave in. So far it hasn’t, but ... it is just kind of nerve-wracking. If you want something that feels more solid, I definitely recommend the Zinus metal daybed frame. (Sadly, the Zinus frame wasn’t available at the time we bought this one.) Pros: Went together pretty easily. Doesn’t rust if you have it on a porch. That’s about it. Sorry. Posting in case this helps others. I definitely regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jen H. W.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty white twin Daybed
customer_reviews.text: I love this Daybed. It everything the picture states and more. It came nicely boxed, with easy to follow directions. My husband and son put it together in less than 30 mins. It looks so nice in my spare room. A few of us adults have slept on it a few times, and it is good and studry. There was no noise when sitting or changing positions. I also like that the bed is high. I put boxes under the bed, and you cannot even see them. I would recommend purchasing this Day Bed.
customer_reviews.author: mobunny

customer_reviews.title: Bed
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful and steady strong bed once built, but it doesn’t come with clear instructions and I had to google how to do it and was missing the final part ball for decoration.
customer_reviews.author: SIBurgos

customer_reviews.title: I love the look
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased this and put it together completely by myself. There were some components that would have been easier with a second person, but it took me about 45 minutes to put together and part of that was dragging the box inside (tad heavy). I love the look. I personally don't hear any creaking as described in some of the other reviews, but I'm also not jumping up and down on the bed. I also purchased the LinenSpa 8" memory foam and springs mattress. It's comfortable enough. This is not my main bed - it's for a guest room/office but I slept on it to test and it was fine. We'll see how it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Callie Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.text: You can’t beat anything out there for the price. The bed came very well packaged. Instructions were extremely easy. We are very pleased with our purchase. Sits high off of the floor too so with it being our 10yr olds bed it makes for awesome storage! It only took me an hr and a half to put it together and that’s with having to walk away a few times to do mommy duties. 😉 The only con about this whole bed is that the hardware is metal color on a white bed.
customer_reviews.author: Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed, great price.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Sturdy and very nice looking set up. All the pieces were there, in perfect condition, and even some extras of the smaller pieces. To get the side rails on you have to kind of push it into place which took a little paint off (rubbed it) but you can't see it, as it's on the under part of the bed on the inside and a small area. Pleased with this purchase. There's a lot of space underneath for storage, if something fell behind there, you could crawl under and get it (even if you're not petite).
customer_reviews.author: AkrBn

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with this! I am a single mom and was really nervous about putting it together by myself. SUPER easy! Every piece is marked and instructions are simple to follow. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Firestone

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, very damaged
customer_reviews.text: Awful. The need arrived with dents and scratches all over, and a bend in the metal so bad that it it cracked the metal. It's not repairable.
customer_reviews.author: KLH

customer_reviews.title: i'm a daybed believer
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loves it. assembly was not terribly complicated, took us about 90 minutes all told. last night was her inaugural sleep and she gives it two thumbs up. the bronze color is in a matte finish, a dark metallic color, not a bright bronze sheen. goodbye box springs, this is a great bed.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Sturdy, pretty, and relatively simple to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Great bed! Sturdy, pretty, and altogether easy to assemble. I was worried it would shake or clank when I move, but it's very solid. I also love that it's a daybed that allows light through—so it's not some giant solid hunk of wood that takes up the whole room. Excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Hal T

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, pretty, quiet bed for great price
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this frame. Bought it for my daughter, and her and her friends love it, and I didn't hear them getting in and out of bed all night like old frame! It only took me a little over an hour to assemble by myself. Thank you DHP for making a high-quality frame that is pretty that I could actually afford!!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Very Good for Spare Bed
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a two-person installation-not hard, but you will need another set of hands. It seems pretty sturdy, but I would not use it as a trampoline. It comes with a few spare parts which is unusual. The bed frame is high enough to accommodate a pull-out bed stored below it, which we did. I believe it will suit our needs.
customer_reviews.author: almerc

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something I could put in a covered outdoor area to make it feel like an outdoor living space. It looks great and is very sturdy. I got an inexpensive mattress, waterproof mattress encasement and a few throw pillows. It gets a lot of use and compliments. It was kind of a pain to put together. Took me a solid hour, but building things isn’t my strong suit.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Costa

customer_reviews.title: Great bed!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! So easy to put together and the end result was beautiful. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: would've gotten 5 but...
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, the head board arrived broken. Not noticeable really, just that one of the "curls" wasn't saudered on properly and was lose. My mom had to push it into place after it was built. Secondly, it came with instructions and they're pretty clear, except that for 2 hours we were trying to place a screw to attach the side of the headboard to the pole only to realize that it wasn't aligned correctly. So we have to wait for my grandfather to fix it. Otherwise I would've given it a five, it's a gorgeous bed but the careless mistakes annoyed me. Also, it isn't black but more of a dark gray. It's pretty big too
customer_reviews.author: Yasmine Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Took hours to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This was incredibly hard to put together. The screws have to be routinely tightened or the bed squeaks incredibly loud. It’s cute but...
customer_reviews.author: Muffin

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and functional, even with regular mattress
customer_reviews.text: Lovely and easy to put together. We used a regular twin mattress about 10" high so the ends come up to the top of the side rails. It also makes it a bit high when just sitting on it as a lounger. We are considering cutting the legs down 2" to make it more useable. If one used a mattress or pad the size shown in the picture, that would not be necessary. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Stargazer Lily

customer_reviews.title: ... our 9 year old daughters room and are very pleased. The design and visible details are great and ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 9 year old daughters room and are very pleased. The design and visible details are great and made for full size bed which is nice for sleepovers. My only complaint is the rungs that support the mattress are made of plastic and although we only had 1 break during setup it is definitely not made to support a ton of weight.
customer_reviews.author: kerae

customer_reviews.title: One easy phone call and they were shipped
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Arrived missing two slats. One easy phone call and they were shipped. Only thing I don't like is all the screw heads that really stand out as they are metal color not matching white. This would be a deal breaker for many people
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Metal came apart!!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE....... at the 3 year mark since the review below and the bed completely broke and collapsed ( thank God my dog wasn’t under it ). 3rd picture shows completely broken. Called customer service and because I’m over the one year mark they will do nothing. This bed is crap Bed was great for first year, but we’re now at 2 1/2 years with it and two metal pieces came apart and so much squeaking my daughter can’t stand it! Not made to last. Don’t buy
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The bed arrived ahead of schedule. I was able to put it together by myself and it was fairly easy. It is very beautiful and sturdy, no squeaking or noises with movement. Only thing I don't like as much is the hardware is silver, and I purchased the white bed, so the hardware doesn't blend in. Someone had mentioned this in a previous review I read, so I did know it would be like that and purchased anyway. Also it was missing two slats, but I don't think that will affect the overall use of the bed. Altogether very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Huro

customer_reviews.title: Very ornate
customer_reviews.text: Love the bed! Easy to assemble and can take some abuse. My dog jumps on and off it a lot and it doesn't creak or sound like its going to collapse. The metal is nice quality, though the only complain (and the reason for 4 stars) is that the clips holding the bed together are plastic instead of metal.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: lovely
customer_reviews.text: this is a very nice bed. the assembly wasn't a snap and a step or two was a bit confusing [ i am sure it was just me]. overall the frame was perfect, no paint flakes or bent parts. it seems very sturdy. i will say that the shipping was sub par . i had to re-order and wait extra time because the first bed was damaged during the final phase of shipping.i was not too happy...but the customer support people were great to work with, and everything turned out well.
customer_reviews.author: bookworm 2

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This bed exceeded my expectations. A lot of the parts were put together so it wasn’t very difficult to assemble. It is surprisingly sturdy and it’s up high enough that you could add a trundle or use storage bins underneath. Looks really nice and much sturdier than I was expecting
customer_reviews.author: Oh_ChasquidoTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: ... a year now and it's still holding up just fine. My 5 and 9 year old sleep together ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been using this for a year now and it's still holding up just fine. My 5 and 9 year old sleep together on the wknds and watch movies and they make it work. There is enough room under that we can store toy bins (Rubbermaid storage containers).
customer_reviews.author: acmarie

customer_reviews.title: Great assembly instructiins
customer_reviews.text: I was blown away by the detailed assembly instructions & how well everything was so carefully packaged! There are even spare hardware pieces! I was able to assemble this by myself( I’m a senior female) easily thanks to the many detailed instructions. I love the color. I would certainly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Mavis McKeown

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Well after 10 days of having it I finally had a day off to put it together. Two of the metal things didn't hook properly, so I wasn't able to lock one of the ends on each side, but other than that it's beautiful. I got a 10 inch spring mattress and a 2 inch platform. Bed is sturdy. Will update later
customer_reviews.author: alarc

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the bed is very hard to assemble straight. Mine is not perfectly aligned. Next, the paint chips off or scratches very easily, which does not make for a cute look. Most unfortunately, the bed squeaks A LOT. I would not recommend this product if you are planning to use it as a bed.
customer_reviews.author: Asher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this daybed for my spare room. The price was so reasonable that I was skeptical about the quality, but it really is a lovely bed! All the parts were there, and I put it together by myself in about half an hour. It’s nice and sturdy, and I would definitely recommend to a friend. I bought a linenspa 8” matress to go with it, and found my bedding at a discount store.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Sones

customer_reviews.title: Makes noise
customer_reviews.text: It was fairly easy to install and looks pretty once everything is complete. Makes metal noise when turning or sitting. Wooden slats would have been better than metal slats. of course I am not going to remove everything and ship it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, attractive daybed, contemporary design
customer_reviews.text: This is a great daybed for the money. took one person just over an hour to put together. recommend.
customer_reviews.author: difeeney

customer_reviews.title: In love with this bed!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bed frame. It has held up beautifully for a month. I wanted a day bed for my college apartment and I was so excited when I found one in a full. I've slept in it every night for a month and no squeaking or anything broken. It has had a full grown man sleep in it too so it holds weight well. The only complaint is that the bolts are silver and stick out but can easily be covered with white spray paint. I highly recommend this bed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the screws should be white like the bed frame
customer_reviews.text: We've had this bed for 2 weeks or so. Its really cute in our daughter's room. It is getting squeaky as she gets in to bed. We will have to look it over and tighten any screws that we can. Also, the screws should be white like the bed frame. They stand out being silver. Or they could have included covers for them. Either way would have looked better aesthetically. But it's not a make it or break it deal for us.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle E.E.

customer_reviews.title: I love the design and size of the daybed
customer_reviews.text: I love the design and size of the daybed. It indicates that it holds up to 450 pounds, but I would hesitate to put that much weight on it. The frame doesn't sound so solid if one jumps on the bed or if 2 people move around on the bed. But for the price, it seems like a pretty good daybed.
customer_reviews.author: drmsilva

customer_reviews.title: It was working fine but recently (about 2 months ago) the screws keep ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bed for my teenager. It was working fine but recently (about 2 months ago) the screws keep coming out of the holes and one of the side bars has come apart. And upon inspection, this particular side bar had been welded together previously. So now I have to find some other kind of plastic screws and nuts to hold this bed together. But other than that, the bed looks as described. I just know to stick to wooden beds or better quality made metal ones. I would not recommend this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie B

customer_reviews.title: Romantic!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It's just what a wanted a boho day bed for my guest room. I have had it for 3 months now and it's holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: She Says

customer_reviews.title: Great value for kid sleepovers
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a day bed for our little girl's room for a place to lounge while reading and for sleepovers. This is perfect! It's a great combination of a guest bed, lounger and couch. And, it's the perfect height for storing bins of toys underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Mike F

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: I bought all the products from amazon in the may month during lockdown for new home. Only this day bed I selected wrong because it is very hard to assemble and makes noise while using. But it gives elegant look in your living room in small budget.
customer_reviews.author: Hema

customer_reviews.title: It Looks as Good as it feels.
customer_reviews.text: It took only an hour and a half, is sturdy and coupled with the Linen Spa Hybrid full mattress, it's wonderful. The only suggestion I would have for anyone purchasing it, is to leave the front and back rails a little loose before putting the rods in, then you have no problems. If not you may force them into the slats and you really don't have to. Great product, great price, beautiful bed.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Cute daybed, perfect for my daughters room. Had originally shown up with missing pieces, but I contracted seller and they were very quick to respond and send me out the missing parts. Put it together quickly. Sturdy and adorable!
customer_reviews.author: C Marie

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: when i order this it came damaged but the company sent me a new one right out and it is a great day bed and for the price its a great quality
customer_reviews.author: Kosie C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4yr old. Great product for the price. We're using her box spring and thin mattress with it. The boxspring definitely makes it a "high" bed. As an adult I wouldn't suggest using it with a box spring, just for aesthetics. My husband and I have both laid on it to read books with our daughter. It feels sturdy. I definitely don't feel like it buckles under our weight. It's just the right amount of fancy. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kasyandra

customer_reviews.title: ... damaged packaging and missing parts but mine arrived in perfect condition and had all it's parts
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit wary as some of the reviews had problems with damaged packaging and missing parts but mine arrived in perfect condition and had all it's parts. It was easy to put together and has been great! ( I am 70 years old and somewhat handy but did it myself in about an hour plus) Looks good and with a nice pillow top mattress it is very comfortable and no squeaks like some others complained of. Good value!
customer_reviews.author: Almost Handy

customer_reviews.title: It's doesn't make and noise and is really sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This arrived quickly and wasn't too hard to put together. My husband did it by himself in just over an hour. We got it for our middle school daughter and she loves it. It's doesn't make and noise and is really sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa H.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Sturdy bed frame!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bed frame! It's very sturdy and was fairly easy to put together (if you follow the directions!) We already had a mattress and box spring, and since the bed doesn't need the box spring I was concerned about where to store it. Once the bed was put together, the box spring easily slid underneath the bed for storage! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Dodson

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble well made beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This bed frame was so easy to assemble. All parts were clearly labeled and fit together perfectly. The washers are even curved to fit tight against posts. Very well made. A beautiful piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: instructions were easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: exactly what I was looking for. was able to use a ratchet set with a hex end to set it up. much easier to use than the tool included. instructions were easy to follow. able to set up with one person until I added the back - then it was easier to have two people to add that piece.
customer_reviews.author: ShielaL

customer_reviews.title: This looks great! My full mattress fits okay on this (the ...
customer_reviews.text: This looks great! My full mattress fits okay on this (the frame is a bit large). It was a bit of a hassle to put together, but worth the work. I did not need to use a box spring, so that was a nice bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice but NOT for kids under 6 !
customer_reviews.text: Ok so it's pretty and sturdy holds I think says 400 pounds or so but warning it says not safe for kids under 6 and it's not easy to return ship so make sure person intended for is old enough but other than that and being time consuming to assemble it's great at the current price a good deal Also good luck finding full size day bed bedding
customer_reviews.author: H and d

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the bed in the picture but it isn't the bed I got. My husband had already put it up by the time I got home and the kids love it but it doesn't work with their room and it is driving me crazy but they won't let me send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Love this bed frame!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bedframe over a year ago. Saved so much space in my small room. it is very sturdy and has maintained in tact. So cute for my room and setting up only took half a night. Directions were very easy to follow. Only thing I didn't like is it is hard to lay on with more than one person. Also, a great day bed for shorter people. Otherwise if you have many pillows its more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie pruett

customer_reviews.title: For this price - you can't beat it! My ...
customer_reviews.text: For this price - you can't beat it! My daughter is thrilled! And we found a matching metal swirly crown cornice piece on Amazon that matches it really well! It's also plenty high enough if you want to add a trundle under it or for plenty of storage.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Domurat

customer_reviews.title: it was a very sturdy and comfortable frame
customer_reviews.text: This frame was just what I needed when I got it, but unfortunately, it came defective. A few of the screws wouldn't go in no matter I did, and the bed creaked VERY loudly for the year that I kept it. I ended up needing to replace it because the noise woke me up, but besides that, it was a very sturdy and comfortable frame!
customer_reviews.author: Calcifer

customer_reviews.title: Great daybed for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase- was deal of the day- so great price- put together in a hour-very easy. looks great---and being a full size daybed- when used as a bed for guests- provides a bit more room than reg daybed.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Masters

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This day bed is awesome! It looks great in our guest room. The assembly was very straight forward, just follow the instructions. I accidentally skipped a step and had to go backwards to continue assembly. Quality so far is great. The packaging was a little dinged up when it arrived, but the contents weren't damaged. Overall, we are very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Day Bed
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I called the manufacturer because I thought I was missing the hardware, but it turns out it was wrapped and taped to the bottom of bed frame and I didn't see it, but it was easy for a woman to put together by myself.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Looks really Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bed and would have given it five stars but one of the welding spots in the back frame was broken. I didn't want to go to the trouble of sending it back since the spot was not in a weight bearing position. Other than that we have been very happy with it. I would have liked it better if it had a cot like springs instead of the bars. I've been told these will start to give if used to much, but we bought it for our nine year old granddaughter so I don't think that will be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jonnakb

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived in good shape with no missing/or damaged parts. The bed was simple to put together but would definitely be easier with 2 people. It looks nice and seems very sturdy and well made! For the money we are very please with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: bobbysgirl

customer_reviews.title: easy to put together and pretty
customer_reviews.text: Nice bed. We have it on our front porch as a seating place and it fits well and looks really pretty. Very happy with it. Fairly easy to put together (nary a cussword was uttered)!
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Frame is weak
customer_reviews.text: Lasted less then a year. Frame is not made of real metal it is not strong. Within the first couple of months the supporting bars started to bend. The screws also have to be tightened regularly or it squeaks very loudly. I think this is again due to not solid quality metal. It's cheap in price and cheaply made. Less then a year and I already have to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: NK Rush

customer_reviews.title: Nice day bed
customer_reviews.text: Time to build was spot on with the manufactures 1.5hr. A few bolts wouldn't line up right unless tightened in in a certain order. Then after the entire bed is put together, I recommend walking around it once again and check every bolt. A few small paint chips and cracks were found after unboxing. Box was pretty beat up so I was surprised it wasn't worse.
customer_reviews.author: The Jake

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful daybed! Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this so I could have a daybed in my son's nursery which with double as a guest room. It's a very nice looking piece, was easy to assemble and feels comfortable to sleep on. It's also high enough for us to store things underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Dani P.

customer_reviews.title: Instructions were very clear and easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: My mother ordered this bed and had it shipped as a Christmas gift. I put it together by myself and it took me a couple of hours. I'm sure it would have taken a lot less time if I had had someone to help me. Instructions were very clear and easy to follow. All pieces (even the screws) were labeled/numbered. I would recommend this to anyone and would order it again if needed. Wonderful Christmas gift. Thanks Mom!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Viv

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. It was great for about the first week and after that it started sagging in the middle. There is no support so the slightest of weight bends the main bar. My daughter is 4 and the only one using it, so it hasn’t been abused it is just made bad!
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla Cazier

customer_reviews.title: Solid Bed Frame - Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality sturdy bed frame at a very affordable price! I assembled the bed myself without any help. Overall, bed assembly was easy but because of the size of the frame, heavy weight of the frame pieces and the many small screws which make this a very sturdy frame, it took me a while to complete on my own. Overall, beautiful frame and no complaints after many weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is actually VERY nice, especially considering how inexpensive it is. Definitely would recommend to anyone that is short on space, but still looking for a nice, dramatic touch! My son loves his new bed, even though it's a bit feminine. Plenty of room for a 12 year old, and with a good mattress it's very sturdy and comfortable too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vilanya

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of the height of the base from the floor!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured, easy to assemble for anyone (I’m an incredibly “non-handy” female), & well-priced. I wish that the base was a little lower to the ground, but other than that, it was a good buy & is serving it’s purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: nicole shubalis

customer_reviews.title: waste of money cheaply
customer_reviews.text: I bought thist bed for my granddaughter and it was so awful the frame was warped..pieces were missing it is a piece of junk..my granddaughter needed a bed so my husband with his skills fixed it..we should of sent it back..the 4 decorated balls that attach to each bed pole are missing..I would not buy this product..waste of money cheaply made
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Guest Room Success
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed! Was looking for daybed for my guest room. Was able to assemble myself only needed help lifting package up the stairs. Looks exactly like photo and very durable. Comes with all tools required for assembly. Can't beat the price on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

product_meta.title: DHP Victoria Daybed, Full Size Metal Frame, Multi-functional Furniture, Bronze
product_meta.description: Color:Bronze| Size:Full| Style:DaybedWhether you are looking for extra seating in the living room or a sleeper for overnight guests, the DHP Victoria Metal Daybed is the perfect fit. With round finial posts, a brushed metal frame, and traditional scrollwork, this daybed has character that will add instant charm to any room. Sturdily constructed, the bed features metal slats and supporting legs for added support and comfort. Additional foundation is not required. This DHP Victoria full-size daybed sleeps two comfortably.
feature_bullets: Available in white, silver and bronze
Use as a bed or as extra seating, fits one standard full-size mattress (sold separately)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,272 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
